Package de.unibayreuth.bayceer.bayeos.xmlrpc.handler.inf

Interface IDataFrame

  • public interface IDataFrame
    Manage data frames (secured)
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    oliver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getFrameRows

        java.util.Vector getFrameRows​(java.lang.Integer frameId,
                              java.util.Vector rowIndexes)
                       throws XmlRpcException
        Get rows of a DataFrame
        Parameters:
        frameId - DataFrame id
        rowIndexes - Row indexes as vector of Integer values, when null all rows are returned
        Returns:
        Vector[Vector<colMeta>, Vector<rowData>]

        colMeta: Vector<Object>

        • [0]: colId as Integer
        • [1]: colIndex as Integer
        • [2]: colType as String
        • [3]: colLabel as String
        rowData: Vector<Object> with Object type in {STRING|DOUBLE|INTEGER|DATE|BOOLEAN} according to column definition
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0

      • writeColValues

        java.lang.Boolean writeColValues​(java.lang.Integer colId,
                                 java.util.Vector values)
                          throws XmlRpcException
        Write the column values to an existing frame column.
        Parameters:
        colId - Column identifier as Integer
        values - Vector<STRING|DOUBLE|INTEGER|DATE|BOOLEAN>
        Returns:
        True|False
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0

      • deleteColValues

        java.lang.Boolean deleteColValues​(java.lang.Integer colId)
                           throws XmlRpcException
        Delete the column values of a frame column.
        Parameters:
        colId - Column identifier
        Returns:
        True|False
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0

      • getColumnRows

        java.util.Vector getColumnRows​(java.util.Vector colIds,
                               java.util.Vector rowIndexes)
                        throws XmlRpcException
        Get rows by column id and row index. Can be used to produce a data frame out of several columns belonging to different frames.
        Parameters:
        colIds - Column ids as vector of Integer values
        rowIndexes - Row indexes as vector of Integer values, when null all rows are returned
        Returns:
        Vector[Vector<colMeta>, Vector<rowData>]
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0
        See Also:
        getFrameRows(Integer frameId, Vector rowIndexes)

      • updateColValues

        java.lang.Boolean updateColValues​(java.lang.Integer colId,
                                  java.util.Vector rowIndexes,
                                  java.util.Vector values)
                           throws XmlRpcException
        Update column values by row index, new values will be inserted
        Parameters:
        colId - Column id as integer
        rowIndexes - Row indexes as vector of Integer values
        values - Vector<STRING|DOUBLE|INTEGER|DATE|BOOLEAN>
        Returns:
        True|False
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0

      • getMaxRowIndex

        java.lang.Integer getMaxRowIndex​(java.util.Vector colIds)
                          throws XmlRpcException
        Get max row index of a set of columns
        Parameters:
        colIds - Column ids as Vector of Integer
        Returns:
        Maximum index of columns as Integer
        Throws:
        XmlRpcException
        Since:
        1.9.0
